sentences.en: black boots with high heels
sentences.cn: 有高跟的黑靴子

sentences.en: He had a blistered heel.
sentences.cn: 他的脚后跟起了泡.

sentences.en: He had an operation on his heel last week.
sentences.cn: 他上星期脚后跟做了手术。

sentences.en: he headed off with Sammy at his heels.
sentences.cn: 他率先离开，萨米紧跟其后。

sentences.en: He shoved the heel of his hand against the side of my face.
sentences.cn: 他用手掌根使劲推我的脸颊。

sentences.en: He simply turned on his heel and walked away.
sentences.cn: 他突然就转身走开了。

sentences.en: He threw the cigarette down and ground it under his heel.
sentences.cn: 他把烟卷丢到地上,用脚踩灭.

sentences.en: Her dog yelped and came to heel.
sentences.cn: 她的狗汪地叫了一声，紧跟了上来。

sentences.en: Horton's Achilles heel was that he could not delegate.
sentences.cn: 霍顿的软肋在于他不懂得放权。

sentences.en: I scuffed the heel of my shoe on the stonework.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋跟儿给铺好的石头磨坏了。

sentences.en: I'm training my dog to come to heel.
sentences.cn: 我在训练我的狗让它紧跟着我.

sentences.en: in the heel of the hunt, the outcome of the match was decided by a penalty.
sentences.cn: 最后，比赛输赢由一点球决定。

sentences.en: My shoe rubbed my heel.
sentences.cn: 我的一只鞋子硌脚跟.

sentences.en: She turned on her elegantly shod heel.
sentences.cn: 她突然转身，迈开穿着雅致的皮鞋的双脚离去了。

sentences.en: Spelling is my Achilles'heel.
sentences.cn: 我最伤脑筋的弱点是拼写出错.

sentences.en: the Greeks spent several centuries under the heel of the Ottoman Empire.
sentences.cn: 希腊人在奥托曼帝国统治下度过了几个世纪。

sentences.en: The postman ran away with the dog nipping at his heel.
sentences.cn: 邮递员跑开了,狗在身后紧追着要咬他.

sentences.en: The rebels have been brought to heel.
sentences.cn: 反叛者被压制了.

sentences.en: The shoe has padding around the collar, heel and tongue for added comfort.
sentences.cn: 鞋子的鞋帮、鞋跟和鞋舌部位都有衬垫，以增加舒适度。

sentences.en: The town has become very down at heel.
sentences.cn: 这座城市已变得破败不堪。

phrases.tran_cn: 褴褛的：衣衫褴褛的；邋遢的；贫穷的

phrases.phrase: in the heel of the hunt
phrases.tran_cn: (爱尔兰)在最后一分钟，在最后时刻；最后，终于
(主北美)度过轻松愉快的时光
逮捕：给某人戴上镣铐；把某人逮捕入狱

phrases.phrase: on the heels of 或 upon the heels of
set (或 rock) someone back on their heels

phrases.tran_cn: n. （女式高跟皮鞋的）细鞋跟

trans.tran_cn: 脚后跟，踵，（鞋、袜等的后跟），（四足动物的）后脚，踵状物
trans.tran_en: the curved back part of your foot
(of a vessel) to lean over; list
